description: Audit log entry recording system activity or API call.

^(create_time)$.description: The timestamp when the audit log was created.

^(service_data)$.description: Service-specific metadata about the request, response, and activities.

createTime.description: The timestamp when the audit log was created.

method.description:
The method or action being audited.
 For example: /bytebase.v1.SQLService/Query or bb.project.repository.push

request.description: The request payload in JSON format.

resource.description: The resource associated with this audit log.

response.description:
The response payload in JSON format.
 Some fields may be omitted if they are too large or contain sensitive information.

serviceData.description: Service-specific metadata about the request, response, and activities.

severity.description: The severity level of this audit log entry.
severity.title: Severity

user.description:
The user who performed the action.
 Format: users/{email}

title: Audit Log
